socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the accuracy of nearby allies, and physical damage taken by nearby enemies. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.

You and nearby allies gain 21% increased Accuracy Rating
